page.title: 18BETHANY JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: Bethany Junior School has been open seven years and was built in the grounds of the Bethany House in the vegatable garden. School starts at 8.45 am and the lessons include science, music, art, games, religious instruction, maths, English and drama and cookery. At 10.20 am there is a break of 15 minutes. Dinner is at 12 midday, they have to provide their own unless they have free ones. The dinner break ends at 1.15 pm when there is another lesson and there is a final break at 2.15 pm for a further 15 minutes and the school finishes at 3.30 pm. 210 children go to Bethany and there are seven teachers ,a Head mistress called Mrs Buckley, a secretary,one welfare assistant,one caretaker and four dinner ladies. Wendy Garraway
